conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render clearly shows walls with height and thickness, a perceptible interior volume, an angled isometric-like view, and the roof/ceiling is removed to reveal the interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness (5). Floors are clearly separate (3). Interior volume is perceivable (4). Wall corners are geometrically correct (3). Angled view is good (5) and interior is visible from an elevated perspective (3). Some minor perspective distortion on the far side (1). Roof is cleanly removed (5), interior spaces fully visible (3). Geometry is clean (2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: Correct number of rooms (3) with accurate adjacency (4). Room proportions are mostly preserved, though some seem slightly stretched in one direction (2). Major room identities match (2). Wall positions align well (5), lengths are proportional (3), and internal partitions are correctly placed (2). Doors are present and on correct walls, though some are just openings (3). Windows are present and on correct walls (2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented (3).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) is present (4). Kitchen elements are present (2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2). Furniture is placed in the correct rooms (3). Furniture scale is reasonable (2). Orientation is logical relative to layout (1). The dining chairs are missing, and some furniture items are simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable (4). Geometry is readable (4). Interior is clearly visible (3). Lighting does not obscure geometry (3). Consistent simple material usage (2). No major rendering artifacts (2). Clean background (2).

summary: The 3D transformation is geometrically very accurate with strong fundamental conversion, maintaining layout fidelity and reasonable interior element representation, resulting in a clear and well-rendered model.
